description: SSP-based RCP scenario following approximately RCP7.0 global forcing pathway but with reduced tropospheric ozone precursors (not methane). SSP3 socioeconomic conditions. Atmosphere only with SST from experiment SSP3-70.
keywords: AerChemMIP, Tier 1, scenario, SSP3, RCP7.0, reduced NTCF, RCP7.0 tropospheric ozone precursors, no methane, atmosphere only
long_name: SSP3-7.0, prescribed SSTs, with low ozone precursor emissions
rationale: To estimate the ERF of tropospheric ozone precursors (but not methane).

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the mid 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2055 41yrs

requirements.description: Sea surface temperature from experiment SSP3-7.
requirements.keywords: SSP3-7, SSP3, RCP7.0, SST, sea surface temperature
requirements.label: SSP3-70 SST

requirements.description: Impose reduced RCP7.0 tropospheric ozone precursor emissions (not Methane).  Beginning in 2014 with air quality policies (or maximum feasible reductions) applied to the SSP3-70 tropospheric ozone precursor NTCF emissions.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway, 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, reduced tropospheric ozone precursors, not methane
requirements.label: RCP70ReducedTroposphericOzonePrecursorsNotMethane

requirements.description: Impose changing concentrations of RCP7.0 methane.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway, 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, methane
requirements.label: RCP70Methane

requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0
requirements.label: RCP70Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation is from the end of the Historical experiment.  To provide continuity between simulations of the recent past and  future scenario simulations.
requirements.label: HistoricalInitialisation

requirements.description: Use an Atmosphere model with chemistry
requirements.label: AGCM-Chem Configuration
